Name: Adam4Adam
Description/Focus: Connects men with men "for friendship  romance  or a hot hookup".
Premium: Yes

Name: Adult FriendFinder
Description/Focus: Members can connect with other adult members based on profiles.
Premium: Yes/No; Free users can respond to contact but cannot initiate contact. Paid users have added benefits.

Name: AnastasiaDate
Description/Focus: Connects Western men with women from Russia and former Soviet Republics – CIS
Premium: Yes

Name: Ashley Madison
Description/Focus: Members are matched up with other married adult members based on profiles.
Premium: Yes/No; Free users can view profiles and respond to contact but cannot initiate contact. Paid users have added benefits.

Name: Badoo
Description/Focus: Badoo enable users to meet new people in their area for chat  dating or to make new friends. Available in 44 languages on the web and on 12 different mobile platforms.
Premium: Yes/No; Charge for higher prominence  higher limits  invisibility  etc.

Name: BeautifulPeople.com
Description/Focus: Dating website where membership is based on a vote  in which existing members rate how attractive they perceive prospective members to be.
Premium: Yes; free profile but subscription required for most features including messaging.

Name: Bumble
Description/Focus: Dating app where women send the first message (for heterosexual matches)
Premium: Yes
Messaging other users: Yes  after mutual match. (In heterosexual matches  messaging can only be initiated by woman.)

Name: Christian Connection
Description/Focus: For Christian singles from the UK  Ireland  Australia  New Zealand  USA  Canada and Singapore
Free: Partial; Free trial. Free basic profile members can still see photos  edit profiles  search  use discussion boards.
Premium: Yes/No; Free basic profile members can still see photos  edit profiles  search  use discussion board. Paid members can freely message  start discussion thread  no daily limit of discussion board entries.
Messaging other users: Yes/No Basic profile members can messaging other users with pre-set replies.

Name: ChristianMingle
Description/Focus: Dating site that caters to Christian singles. Members may choose whether to specify the Christian denomination to which they belong.
Premium: [null]

Name: Coffee Meets Bagel
Description/Focus: App providing daily curated matches based on Facebook connections
Premium: Yes/No: "Beans" (in-app currency) unlock extra features  such as matching with users who aren't in your curated list. Premium membership enables activity reports  read receipts  extra beans.[19]

Name: Compatible Partners
Description/Focus: eHarmony's service for same-sex relationships
Premium: Yes

Name: Cupid.com
Description/Focus: Dating website for people who are looking for romantic relationships. Cupid.com is owned by NSI Holdings Ltd.
Premium: Yes/No; Free: registration  profile  search  pictures uploading  send and receive winks  chat rooms  promo activities. VIP users can send and reply to mails  view full-size personal photos

Name: DateMySchool
Description/Focus: Dedicated to verified college students and alumni (via education database). Strong emphasis on privacy and safety. Can block by departments and schools. Members only see intersection of what they are looking for and what other members are looking for.
Premium: Yes/No; All users can view profiles. Free messaging and status posting for undergraduates (5 messages/day limit). Alumni cannot initiate or respond to contact or post status updates. All Paid users can message and post and they also have added benefits.

Name: DNA Romance / SingldOut
Description/Focus: Web App providing curated matches based on "chemistry attraction"  personality compatibility and you also see a photograph. SingldOut has changed its web address DNA-Romance.com.
Premium: Yes; free profile.

Name: eHarmony
Description/Focus: Dating site based upon pre-screening using personality tests.
Premium: Yes; free profile but subscription required for most features including messaging.
Supports same-sex connections: Yes; via their Compatible Partners brand[26]

Name: Gaydar
Description/Focus: Profile-based dating website for gay and bisexual men  women  and couples.
Premium: Yes/No

Name: GayRomeo / PlanetRomeo
Description/Focus: Worldwide social network  instant messaging and dating community for gay  bisexual and transgender men.
Free: Free: communication  profile and picture views  search engine
Premium: Yes/No: video downloads  higher database limits  deactivation of advertising

Name: Gleeden
Description/Focus: Social network  instant messaging and dating community for extra-marital relationships.
Free: Non-free: Costs credits to send and read messages unlimited number of times to one user
Premium: Yes/No: Premium gives higher database limits  deactivation of advertising

Name: Grindr
Description/Focus: Geosocial networking application based on Android and iOS.
Premium: Yes

Name: Her[34]
Description/Focus: Geosocial networking application based on Android and iOS with Facebook integration. Men are not allowed to create profiles on the platform.
Premium: Free

Name: JDate
Description/Focus: Dating site that serves people of a Jewish background as well as those interested in them.
Premium: [null]

Name: JSwipe
Description/Focus: Online dating app targeted at millennial Jewish singles.
Premium: Yes
Messaging other users: Yes  after mutual match. Otherwise  premium-only feature.

Name: Lovestruck.com
Description/Focus: Online dating for single professionals in UK  Hong Kong and Singapore
Premium: Yes

Name: Mamba
Description/Focus: Social-network-like dating site  primarily CIS/former Soviet Union  but some international presence. Primary language is Russian  but all languages welcome (and searchable). Caters to all audiences.
Alexa ranking: 1.999[42] for named portal; also 3-5% of mail.ru (#31) and rambler.ru (#191)  which offer access to the same services and communication with the entire user pool through love.mail.ru and love.rambler.ru subdomains
Free: Free: communication  profile and picture views  simpler engine  blogs
Premium: Yes: Premium content like additional search criteria and double appearances in others' relevant searches for "VIP membership". Single payments for regional advertising of profile (one-time appearance in scrolling banner for $1 – user picture  link  short text for mouseover; bidding war for stationary second banner + cost of $1/minute).

Name: Manhunt
Description/Focus: Profile-based dating website for men seeking men
Free: Free: Messaging  search  20 profile views per day  video chat.
Premium: Yes/No: Manhunt VIP includes unlimited profile views  view full-sized profile photos  unlimited buddies  unlimited blocks  saved searches

Name: Match.com
Description/Focus: [null]
Premium: Yes

Name: Matchmaker.com
Description/Focus: Dating service founded in 1986
Premium: [null]

Name: Meetic
Description/Focus: European online dating service owned by IAC
Premium: Yes

Name: Moonit
Description/Focus: Offers compatibility match according to user' birthdate.
Premium: Yes

Name: OkCupid (OKC)
Description/Focus: Uses answers from user-generated questions to find matches that conform to a user's stated preferences.
Premium: Yes/No; Free to join  search  messaging  and chat. Non essential features like sponsored profile promotion available for paid "A-List" members.[53][54]

Name: Parship
Description/Focus: Dating site for people looking for a long-term relationship  using a personality test. Available in Europe and Mexico.
Premium: Yes; free profile but subscription required for most features including messaging.

Name: Perfectmatch.com
Description/Focus: This dating website is using heuristic algorithms to find matches.
Premium: Yes

Name: PlentyofFish (POF)
Description/Focus: Dating site mostly active in United States  Canada  United Kingdom and Brazil
Premium: Yes/No; While it is free to use  POF offers premium services as part of their upgraded membership  such as seeing the date and time a user viewed your profile and allowing you to see whether a user read and/or deleted your message.[59]

Name: Right Stuff
Description/Focus: Dating site for graduates and faculty of Ivy League  Seven Sisters  and about 50 similar colleges and universities and medical schools
Premium: $50 Fee for 6 month membership  plus $3 for profile of members of interest

Name: RocknRollDating
Description/Focus: Dating site for musical compatible couples. Supports heterosexual  same sex and polyamorous relationships.
Premium: No

Name: Scruff
Description/Focus: Dating app for gay and bisexual men
Premium: Yes

Name: ShakeMyWorld
Description/Focus: Swedish. Listed as one of the top 100 Swedish web sites of 2008.[64]
Premium: Non-free based on user creating activities.

Name: SpeedDate.com
Description/Focus: Online speed dating site  where users meet via text  audio  and video chat
Premium: Premium users can continue communicating after unlimited free speed dates

Name: Spray Date
Description/Focus: Run by Spray Network AB
Premium: Premium users can see larger images and have more search options

Name: Taimi
Description/Focus: Geosocial networking application based on Android and iOS for LGBTQI+ community.
Premium: Yes

Name: Tastebuds.fm
Description/Focus: Utilizes tastes in music
Premium: Yes; Subscription required to send or receive messages.
Messaging other users: Used to be free and is free for users that joined before it became non-free. Not free for new users

Name: Tawkify
Description/Focus: Has human matchmakers who set up matches rather than having users find each other.[71]
Premium: Non-free based on user creating activities.

Name: Tinder
Description/Focus: Mobile single dating site
Premium: Yes – premium users get unlimited swipes  can undo a no-swipe  can browse in other locations  in addition to some other preferences and features

Name: Zoosk
Description/Focus: Has an integration with Facebook community.[75]
Premium: Yes/No; Searching and viewing partial profiles is included with free account like most dating sites  fee or monthly subscription for full communication with other members.[78]
